DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Changes Bone Density With Same Bone-health Plan , But With Different Bone-health Supplements
DOC.detailed_description: The US Surgeon General 's Report Bone Health suggest America 's bone-health jeopardy issue `` call action '' develop bone-health plan : 1. improve nutrition , 2. increase health literacy , 3. increase physical activity . The purpose study use comparative effective research model compare 6-month change bone mineral density ( BMD ) two study group . Both follow bone health plan contain three component list plant-source calcium supplement , enhance different level calcium , vitamin D3 , vitamin K magnesium .
